alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Clay and southwestern Duval Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cecil Field, or 9 miles northwest of Orange Park, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Cecil Field, Nas Jax, Doctors Inlet, Ortega, Lakeside, Normandy, Oakleaf Plantation, Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace and Asbury Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval
